title: Authors and Citation
text: Dray M (2022). tamRgo: Digital Pets R. R package version 0.0.0.9000.
code: @Manual{,   title = {tamRgo: Digital Pets For R},   author = {Matt Dray},   year = {2022},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000}, }

title: Digital Pets For R
text: Tamago (egg) + uotchi (‘watch’) = Tamagotchi. Tamago + R = {tamRgo}. work--progress R package create care digital pet, using GitHub gists store pet ‘blueprints’. Don’t try install ; basic functionality missing may alter files machine without knowledge.

title: A tamRgo Pet Blueprint (List) — blueprint_list
text: demo blueprint tamRgo pet list.

title: A tamRgo Pet Blueprint (List) — blueprint_list
A tamRgo Pet Blueprint (List) — blueprint_list
text: list two elements length 5 3 respectively, containing character integer vectors length 1. characteristics 'name' (character), 'species' (character), 'stage' (integer), 'born' (character) 'age' (integer) status 'hungry' (integer), 'happy' (integer) 'dirty' (integer)

what: A tamRgo Pet Blueprint (YAML String) — blueprint_yaml
title: A tamRgo Pet Blueprint (YAML String) — blueprint_yaml
text: demo blueprint tamRgo pet character string represents YAML file.

title: A tamRgo Pet Blueprint (YAML String) — blueprint_yaml
A tamRgo Pet Blueprint (YAML String) — blueprint_yaml
text: character string represents YAML file two lists 5 3 members respectively. characteristics 'name' (character), 'species' (character), 'stage' (integer), 'born' (character) 'age' (integer) status 'hungry' (integer), 'happy' (integer) 'dirty' (integer)

title: Clean A tamRgo Pet — clean_pet
text: Clean tamRgo pet, decreasing 'dirty' status 1.

title: Clean A tamRgo Pet — clean_pet
Clean A tamRgo Pet — clean_pet
text: pet_id Character. GitHub gist ID YAML file contains given tamRgo pet's blueprint. default uses TAMRGO_PET_ID value stored user's Renviron.

title: Clean A tamRgo Pet — clean_pet
text: Nothing.

title: Clean A tamRgo Pet — clean_pet
Change A Blueprint Status Value — .change_status
text: Change status value pet. may happen time (.e. hunger increase) result player interaction (e.g. feeding reduce hunger).

title: Change A Blueprint Status Value — .change_status
code: .change_status(   pet_id = Sys.getenv("TAMRGO_PET_ID"),   status_type = c("happy", "hungry", "dirty"),   change = 1L,   min_value = 0L,   max_value = 5L )

title: Change A Blueprint Status Value — .change_status
text: pet_id Character. GitHub gist ID YAML file contains given tamRgo pet's blueprint. default uses TAMRGO_PET_ID value current environment. status_type Character. status updated. One 'hungry', 'happy' 'dirty'. change Integer. amount status value change (can positive negative, must values min_value max_value) min_value Integer. minimum value status value can take. max_value Integer. maximum value status value can take.

title: Change A Blueprint Status Value — .change_status
text: Nothing. Messages may printed console GitHub gist may updated.

title: Change A Blueprint Status Value — .change_status

what: Generate A Blueprint For A New tamRgo Pet — .create_blueprint
title: Generate A Blueprint For A New tamRgo Pet — .create_blueprint
text: Generate Blueprint New tamRgo Pet

title: Generate A Blueprint For A New tamRgo Pet — .create_blueprint
Generate A Blueprint For A New tamRgo Pet — .create_blueprint
text: pet_name Character. name new tamRgo pet. seed Integer NULL. Supply seed value recreate given tamRgo pet's sampled values. Defaults NULL.

title: Generate A Blueprint For A New tamRgo Pet — .create_blueprint
text: list. See details.

title: Generate A Blueprint For A New tamRgo Pet — .create_blueprint
text: tamRgo 'blueprint' list two lists ('characteristics' 'status') stores information pet. sublist 'characteristics' contains: pet_id Unique pet identification number (GitHub Gist ID number) name pet's name species Type pet born Date birth stage Growth stage reached age Days since birth xp Experience points sublist 'status' contains: hungry Hunger scale 1 (least) 5 () happy Happiness scale 1 (least) 5 () dirty Dirtiness scale 1 (least) 5 ()

title: Generate A Blueprint For A New tamRgo Pet — .create_blueprint

title: Create an 'tamRgo.environ' File in User's Home Directory — .create_environ

title: Create an 'tamRgo.environ' File in User's Home Directory — .create_environ
Create an 'tamRgo.environ' File in User's Home Directory — .create_environ
text: pet_id Character. GitHub gist ID YAML file contains given tamRgo pet's blueprint. default uses TAMRGO_PET_ID value current environment.

text: pet_id Character. GitHub gist ID YAML file contains given tamRgo pet's blueprint. default uses TAMRGO_PET_ID value current environment. Character. name characteristic status updated pet blueprint. See details. new_value Character integer (see details). value overwrite current value blueprint (GitHub gist YAML) blueprint variable provided '' argument.
